{"success":true,"message":"Success","data":{"current_page":1,"data":[{"id":2,"title":"Local Artisan Empowerment","create_by":1,"created_at":"2025-12-31T05:48:48.000000Z","updated_at":"2025-12-31T05:48:48.000000Z","thumbnail_url":"https:\/\/images.unsplash.com\/photo-1452860606245-08befc0ff44b?w=800","creator":{"id":1,"username":"admin","name":"Administrator","email":"admin@example.com","division":"IT","role_id":1,"created_at":"2025-12-31T05:48:48.000000Z","updated_at":"2025-12-31T05:48:48.000000Z","deleted_at":null},"content":{"id":2,"csr_id":2,"content":"

Supporting Local Craftsmen<\/h2>

We work directly with local artisans, providing them with fair wages and skill development opportunities. Our program has benefited over 500 craftsmen families.<\/p>

Each piece of furniture carries the legacy of traditional craftsmanship passed down through generations.<\/p>"}},{"id":3,"title":"Clean Water Project","create_by":1,"created_at":"2025-12-31T05:48:48.000000Z","updated_at":"2025-12-31T05:48:48.000000Z","thumbnail_url":"https:\/\/images.unsplash.com\/photo-1538300342682-cf57afb97285?w=800","creator":{"id":1,"username":"admin","name":"Administrator","email":"admin@example.com","division":"IT","role_id":1,"created_at":"2025-12-31T05:48:48.000000Z","updated_at":"2025-12-31T05:48:48.000000Z","deleted_at":null},"content":{"id":3,"csr_id":3,"content":"

Access to Clean Water<\/h2>

We have installed water purification systems in 20 villages near our manufacturing facilities. Over 5,000 people now have access to clean drinking water.<\/p>

This project reflects our commitment to community well-being beyond just business operations.<\/p>"}},{"id":4,"title":"Education Scholarship Fund","create_by":1,"created_at":"2025-12-31T05:48:48.000000Z","updated_at":"2025-12-31T05:48:48.000000Z","thumbnail_url":"https:\/\/images.unsplash.com\/photo-1503676260728-1c00da094a0b?w=800","creator":{"id":1,"username":"admin","name":"Administrator","email":"admin@example.com","division":"IT","role_id":1,"created_at":"2025-12-31T05:48:48.000000Z","updated_at":"2025-12-31T05:48:48.000000Z","deleted_at":null},"content":{"id":4,"csr_id":4,"content":"

Investing in Future Generations<\/h2>

Our scholarship program supports children of local craftsmen to pursue higher education. Since 2020, we have funded 150 scholarships.<\/p>

Education is the foundation for sustainable community development.<\/p>"}},{"id":5,"title":"Sustainable Forestry Partnership","create_by":1,"created_at":"2025-12-31T05:48:48.000000Z","updated_at":"2025-12-31T05:48:48.000000Z","thumbnail_url":"https:\/\/images.unsplash.com\/photo-1448375240586-882707db888b?w=800","creator":{"id":1,"username":"admin","name":"Administrator","email":"admin@example.com","division":"IT","role_id":1,"created_at":"2025-12-31T05:48:48.000000Z","updated_at":"2025-12-31T05:48:48.000000Z","deleted_at":null},"content":{"id":5,"csr_id":5,"content":"

Responsible Wood Sourcing<\/h2>

All our teak wood comes from certified sustainable forests. We partner with FSC-certified suppliers to ensure responsible forestry practices.<\/p>

Sustainability is not just a choice, it is our responsibility for future generations.<\/p>"}},{"id":6,"title":"Women Empowerment Workshop","create_by":1,"created_at":"2025-12-31T05:48:48.000000Z","updated_at":"2025-12-31T05:48:48.000000Z","thumbnail_url":"https:\/\/images.unsplash.com\/photo-1573497019940-1c28c88b4f3e?w=800","creator":{"id":1,"username":"admin","name":"Administrator","email":"admin@example.com","division":"IT","role_id":1,"created_at":"2025-12-31T05:48:48.000000Z","updated_at":"2025-12-31T05:48:48.000000Z","deleted_at":null},"content":{"id":6,"csr_id":6,"content":"

Empowering Women Artisans<\/h2>

Our dedicated women empowerment program provides training in furniture finishing and design. Over 100 women have joined our workforce through this initiative.<\/p>

Gender equality in the workplace creates stronger communities.<\/p>"}},{"id":1,"title":"Tree Planting Initiative 2024","create_by":1,"created_at":"2025-12-31T05:48:48.000000Z","updated_at":"2025-12-31T05:48:48.000000Z","thumbnail_url":"https:\/\/images.unsplash.com\/photo-1542601906990-b4d3fb778b09?w=800","creator":{"id":1,"username":"admin","name":"Administrator","email":"admin@example.com","division":"IT","role_id":1,"created_at":"2025-12-31T05:48:48.000000Z","updated_at":"2025-12-31T05:48:48.000000Z","deleted_at":null},"content":{"id":1,"csr_id":1,"content":"

Reforestation Program<\/h2>

Our commitment to sustainability includes planting over 10,000 trees annually in deforested areas. This initiative helps restore natural habitats and supports local communities.<\/p>

Through partnerships with local farmers, we ensure that every tree planted contributes to long-term environmental restoration.<\/p>"}}],"first_page_url":"http:\/\/localhost\/api\/v1\/csrs?page=1","from":1,"last_page":3,"last_page_url":"http:\/\/localhost\/api\/v1\/csrs?page=3","links":[{"url":null,"label":"« Previous","active":false},{"url":"http:\/\/localhost\/api\/v1\/csrs?page=1","label":"1","active":true},{"url":"http:\/\/localhost\/api\/v1\/csrs?page=2","label":"2","active":false},{"url":"http:\/\/localhost\/api\/v1\/csrs?page=3","label":"3","active":false},{"url":"http:\/\/localhost\/api\/v1\/csrs?page=2","label":"Next »","active":false}],"next_page_url":"http:\/\/localhost\/api\/v1\/csrs?page=2","path":"http:\/\/localhost\/api\/v1\/csrs","per_page":6,"prev_page_url":null,"to":6,"total":15}}

{"success":true,"message":"Success","data":{"id":1,"title":"Tree Planting Initiative 2024","create_by":1,"created_at":"2025-12-31T05:48:48.000000Z","updated_at":"2025-12-31T05:48:48.000000Z","deleted_at":null,"thumbnail_url":"https:\/\/images.unsplash.com\/photo-1542601906990-b4d3fb778b09?w=800","creator":{"id":1,"username":"admin","name":"Administrator","email":"admin@example.com","division":"IT","role_id":1,"created_at":"2025-12-31T05:48:48.000000Z","updated_at":"2025-12-31T05:48:48.000000Z","deleted_at":null},"content":{"id":1,"csr_id":1,"content":"

Reforestation Program<\/h2>

Our commitment to sustainability includes planting over 10,000 trees annually in deforested areas. This initiative helps restore natural habitats and supports local communities.<\/p>

Through partnerships with local farmers, we ensure that every tree planted contributes to long-term environmental restoration.<\/p>","created_at":"2025-12-31T05:48:48.000000Z","updated_at":"2025-12-31T05:48:48.000000Z"}}}

{"success":true,"message":"Success","data":{"current_page":1,"data":[{"id":2,"title":"Company Celebrates 15 Years of Excellence","is_top_news":false,"create_by":1,"created_at":"2025-12-31T05:48:48.000000Z","updated_at":"2025-12-31T05:48:48.000000Z","thumbnail_url":"https:\/\/images.unsplash.com\/photo-1556761175-b413da4baf72?w=800","creator":{"id":1,"username":"admin","name":"Administrator","email":"admin@example.com","division":"IT","role_id":1,"created_at":"2025-12-31T05:48:48.000000Z","updated_at":"2025-12-31T05:48:48.000000Z","deleted_at":null},"content":{"id":2,"news_id":2,"content":"

A Milestone Anniversary<\/h2>

This year marks our 15th anniversary in the furniture industry. From a small workshop to an international brand, our journey has been remarkable.<\/p>

We extend our heartfelt thanks to our customers, partners, and the dedicated team who made this possible.<\/p>"}},{"id":3,"title":"Expansion to European Market","is_top_news":false,"create_by":1,"created_at":"2025-12-31T05:48:48.000000Z","updated_at":"2025-12-31T05:48:48.000000Z","thumbnail_url":"https:\/\/images.unsplash.com\/photo-1519389950473-47ba0277781c?w=800","creator":{"id":1,"username":"admin","name":"Administrator","email":"admin@example.com","division":"IT","role_id":1,"created_at":"2025-12-31T05:48:48.000000Z","updated_at":"2025-12-31T05:48:48.000000Z","deleted_at":null},"content":{"id":3,"news_id":3,"content":"

New Markets, New Opportunities<\/h2>

We are excited to announce our expansion into the European market. Our showrooms will soon be available in Germany, France, and the Netherlands.<\/p>

This expansion brings our authentic Indonesian craftsmanship closer to European customers who appreciate quality and sustainability.<\/p>"}},{"id":4,"title":"Award-Winning Design Recognition","is_top_news":false,"create_by":1,"created_at":"2025-12-31T05:48:48.000000Z","updated_at":"2025-12-31T05:48:48.000000Z","thumbnail_url":"https:\/\/images.unsplash.com\/photo-1506439773649-6e0eb8cfb237?w=800","creator":{"id":1,"username":"admin","name":"Administrator","email":"admin@example.com","division":"IT","role_id":1,"created_at":"2025-12-31T05:48:48.000000Z","updated_at":"2025-12-31T05:48:48.000000Z","deleted_at":null},"content":{"id":4,"news_id":4,"content":"

International Design Award<\/h2>

Our Modern Heritage Chair has won the prestigious International Furniture Design Award 2024. This recognition highlights our commitment to innovative design.<\/p>

We are honored to receive this award and will continue pushing the boundaries of furniture design.<\/p>"}},{"id":5,"title":"Sustainable Manufacturing Certification","is_top_news":false,"create_by":1,"created_at":"2025-12-31T05:48:48.000000Z","updated_at":"2025-12-31T05:48:48.000000Z","thumbnail_url":"https:\/\/images.unsplash.com\/photo-1448375240586-882707db888b?w=800","creator":{"id":1,"username":"admin","name":"Administrator","email":"admin@example.com","division":"IT","role_id":1,"created_at":"2025-12-31T05:48:48.000000Z","updated_at":"2025-12-31T05:48:48.000000Z","deleted_at":null},"content":{"id":5,"news_id":5,"content":"

FSC Certification Renewed<\/h2>

We are proud to announce the renewal of our FSC (Forest Stewardship Council) certification, reaffirming our commitment to sustainable forestry practices.<\/p>

Every piece of furniture you purchase supports responsible forest management.<\/p>"}},{"id":6,"title":"New Factory Technology Upgrade","is_top_news":false,"create_by":1,"created_at":"2025-12-31T05:48:48.000000Z","updated_at":"2025-12-31T05:48:48.000000Z","thumbnail_url":"https:\/\/images.unsplash.com\/photo-1565793298595-6a879b1d9492?w=800","creator":{"id":1,"username":"admin","name":"Administrator","email":"admin@example.com","division":"IT","role_id":1,"created_at":"2025-12-31T05:48:48.000000Z","updated_at":"2025-12-31T05:48:48.000000Z","deleted_at":null},"content":{"id":6,"news_id":6,"content":"

Investing in Precision<\/h2>

Our factory has undergone a significant technology upgrade with state-of-the-art CNC machines that enhance precision while maintaining our handcrafted finish.<\/p>

Technology and tradition work hand in hand to deliver the best quality products.<\/p>"}},{"id":7,"title":"Partnership with Luxury Hotels","is_top_news":false,"create_by":1,"created_at":"2025-12-31T05:48:48.000000Z","updated_at":"2025-12-31T05:48:48.000000Z","thumbnail_url":"https:\/\/images.unsplash.com\/photo-1566073771259-6a8506099945?w=800","creator":{"id":1,"username":"admin","name":"Administrator","email":"admin@example.com","division":"IT","role_id":1,"created_at":"2025-12-31T05:48:48.000000Z","updated_at":"2025-12-31T05:48:48.000000Z","deleted_at":null},"content":{"id":7,"news_id":7,"content":"

Furnishing Five-Star Properties<\/h2>

We have secured partnerships with several five-star hotel chains to supply custom furniture for their properties across Asia and the Middle East.<\/p>

Our furniture will grace the lobbies and suites of world-renowned hospitality brands.<\/p>"}},{"id":1,"title":"New Premium Collection Launch 2024","is_top_news":true,"create_by":1,"created_at":"2025-12-31T05:48:48.000000Z","updated_at":"2025-12-31T05:48:48.000000Z","thumbnail_url":"https:\/\/images.unsplash.com\/photo-1555041469-a586c61ea9bc?w=800","creator":{"id":1,"username":"admin","name":"Administrator","email":"admin@example.com","division":"IT","role_id":1,"created_at":"2025-12-31T05:48:48.000000Z","updated_at":"2025-12-31T05:48:48.000000Z","deleted_at":null},"content":{"id":1,"news_id":1,"content":"

Introducing Our Finest Collection<\/h2>

We are thrilled to announce the launch of our Premium Collection 2024, featuring handcrafted furniture pieces that blend traditional craftsmanship with contemporary design.<\/p>

Each piece in this collection represents months of meticulous work by our master artisans, using only the finest teak wood sourced from sustainable forests.<\/p>"}}],"first_page_url":"http:\/\/localhost\/api\/v1\/news?page=1","from":1,"last_page":3,"last_page_url":"http:\/\/localhost\/api\/v1\/news?page=3","links":[{"url":null,"label":"« Previous","active":false},{"url":"http:\/\/localhost\/api\/v1\/news?page=1","label":"1","active":true},{"url":"http:\/\/localhost\/api\/v1\/news?page=2","label":"2","active":false},{"url":"http:\/\/localhost\/api\/v1\/news?page=3","label":"3","active":false},{"url":"http:\/\/localhost\/api\/v1\/news?page=2","label":"Next »","active":false}],"next_page_url":"http:\/\/localhost\/api\/v1\/news?page=2","path":"http:\/\/localhost\/api\/v1\/news","per_page":7,"prev_page_url":null,"to":7,"total":20}}
